summary: CRITICAL: Backend API completely inaccessible due to Cloudflare 520 errors. Frontend loads but cannot fetch data. Phase Performance Heatmap API testing blocked.

critical_bugs.issue: Cloudflare 520 error: Web server is returning an unknown error
critical_bugs.impact: Complete backend API failure - no endpoints accessible

critical_bugs.issue: Phase Performance Heatmap API completely inaccessible
critical_bugs.impact: BLOCK 73.6 Phase Performance Heatmap feature cannot be tested

server_issues.symptoms: All API requests return Cloudflare 520 error page

integration_issues.issue: Cannot fetch phase performance data due to backend API failure
Loading chart... stuck indefinitely due to API failures
Failed to load strategy data error message displayed

ui_bugs.issue: Shows skeleton placeholders instead of content due to API failures

passed_tests: Chart mode switcher renders (Price, Replay, Hybrid modes)

items: Fix Cloudflare 520 server errors - all backend APIs are completely inaccessible
Investigate origin server connection issues at fractal-frontend.cluster-5.preview.emergentcf.cloud
Check backend service status and supervisor configuration
Verify internal port mapping and service routing
Once backend is restored, re-test Phase Performance Heatmap API (/api/fractal/v2.1/admin/phase-performance)
action_item_for_main_agent.blocking_issue: More than 50% of functionality is broken - complete backend API failure prevents all testing
action_item_for_main_agent.next_steps: Cannot proceed with Phase Performance Heatmap testing until backend APIs are restored
